Unitron:


Unitron laughed a little more, his wrist weapon shutting down.  In his left 
hand appeared an energy blade he activated from subspace.  "Not so might now, 
are you impostor?  You make Galvatron proud with your failure!"

He took a step forward and threw the five foot long energy blade (not 
counting the hilt's length) down, blade first, towards Megatron's left 
shoulder.
